umpchange,3,umphome,burkk101 umpchange,3,ump2b,(None) $HP umpire Lee Weyer struck near the right elbow by foul ball on the 0-2 pitch; injured and left game; 2B umpire Ken Burkhart moved to HP

ej,hundr101,P,olsea901,Refusal to give umpire the ball ej,durol101,M,olsea901,Threw ball into dugout $Fergie Jenkins threw the ball to Randy Hundley, asking the catcher to rub the shine off it; HP umpire Andy Olsen asked Hundley for the ball but Hundley refused, putting the ball behind his back; Hundley was ejected by Olsen; Cubs Manager Leo Durocher ran out, took the ball from Hundley and rolled it into the Cubs dugout; Durocher was ejected by Olsen
Ron Herbel objected to the ball four call and was told to be quiet by HP umpire Andy Olsen

Debut game for Ken Forsch
Debut game for Dave Robinson
ej,gastc191,P,sudoe901,Called strike 3 $Gaston ejected by HP umpire Sudol for arguing called strike 3
umpchange,9,umphome,weyel901 umpchange,9,ump2b,(None) $HP umpire Sudol injured sometime in 9th with foul ball off his foot; Weyer went behind the plate and the game was finished with 3 umpires
